ra_dec_error_68.description: Statistical error on position with 68 percent containment probability.

ra_dec_error_95.description: Statistical error on position with 95 percent containment probability.

n_events.description: The number of neutrinoes in the event.

collection_duration.description: The interval over which the neutrinoes are collected.

energy_limit.description: Minimum energy of the neutrinoes in kEV.

distance_range.description: Lower and Upper bounds on the distance of the event.
